import React,{Component} from 'react'; import {Form,Button,Checkbox,Header,Input} from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from 'axios'; class AddQuestion extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {} this.state = { Answers: [{answer:""}] }; } handleChange = (e, { value }) => this.setState({ value }) render(){ return(
New Question
{this.state.value && this.state.value === "Create Answers"?
:null }

); } } export default AddQuestion
